TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event, event, and event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> class contains information for several different Web Parts events that can be canceled. These events include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> events. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> class provides access to the Web Parts control involved in the event. The Web Parts control is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A> property.
